text.section:
As used in this section, "change of control" means:
A transfer of voting stock which results in giving a person, directly or indirectly, the power to direct the management and policy of a mortgage loan company or mortgage loan broker; or
A transfer of at least ten percent (10%) of the outstanding voting stock of a mortgage loan company or a mortgage loan broker.
A transfer of voting stock of a mortgage loan company or mortgage loan broker which constitutes a change of control shall be approved in writing by the commissioner, prior to the transfer.

The owner, president, chief executive officer or a partner shall apply to the commissioner for approval of a transfer of voting stock in his mortgage loan company or mortgage loan broker which constitutes a change of control. The application must contain information which shows that the requirements of this subtitle for obtaining a license will be satisfied after the change of control.
